img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8b/Wukong_Pagoda_63.jpg)
Once you reach the fourth level, the escape from this hell is closer than ever, but there's still one last stretch to cover.
img_below_text:
Head outside the cells slowly, and you can poke a Blade Monk on the outside off the ledge he's standing on the edge of.
![Wukong Pagoda 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Wukong_Pagoda_66.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a combat sequence in *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the player character is engaged in a fight against an enemy wielding a large weapon. The setting appears to be near a massive, ornate structure resembling a pagoda or temple, with intricate carvings and barred windows. This scene likely represents a challenging encounter as the player progresses through the fourth level of the pagoda, moving closer to escaping the area.
